what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal biclar store code (releases) data estimating cycling potential influencing policy. biclar tool design assessment different scenarios cycling network models Lisbon metropolitan area (LMA).

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: key datasets follows: Trips dataset Origin Destination, Freguesia level, disaggregated transport mode, Instituto National de Estatística (2018) CAOP 2020 - Official limits Portuguese areas. Road network OpenStreetMap Main public transport interfaces Lisbon Metro Region, provided Transportes Metropolitanos de Lisboa

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: baseline scenario makes use 2018 mobility survey data LMA. considered trips Freguesias. See vignette baseline scenario see modeled.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: National targets cycling uptake set : 4% trips made bicycle 2025 10% trips made bicycle 2030 Cycling trips replace car trips directly. See vignette ENMAC scenario see modeled.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: See vignette Intermodal scenario see modeled.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: See vignette E-bike scenario see modeled.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: biclar uses methods developed PCT.bike (Lovelace et al. 2017) cycling uptake estimation data visualization.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: disagregation OD pairs Freguesias level, use OD Jittering (Lovelace, Félix, Carlino 2022) method, better suits walking cycling trips modelling (shorter distances), instead relying centroids concentrate trips areas. OD datasets, jittering, shown .

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Use CyclingStreets.net (R package) fast quiet bike routes baseline scenario. e-bike scenario, developed proper algorithm, considering topography (slopes package).

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: made use developed methodology considers replacing long trips bike + train ferry trips (name package)

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Health Economic Assessment Tool (HEAT v5.0) walking cycling .
